Key Match Events: Cole Palmer scored his first England goal from a penalty
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a stunning volley for England's second goal
Harry Kane scored England's third goal
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate made several substitutions, including bringing on Harry Kane, James Maddison, and Jack Grealish
Jarrad Branthwaite and Adam Wharton made their England debuts
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised his team's performance, particularly their resilience and ability to come back from a slow start
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was England's final warm-up game before the Euro 2024 tournament
The match was played at St James' Park
Others: Eberechi Eze and Cole Palmer had impressive performances for England
Conor Gallagher came close to scoring for England
